content.html:
Man is a problem-solving, skill-using, social animal. Once he has satisfied his hunger, two main kinds of experiences are significant to him. One of his deepest needs is to apply his skills, whatever they be, to challenging tasks ‚Äî to feel the exhilaration of the well-struck ball or the well-solved problem. The other need is to find meaningful and warm relations with a few other human beings ‚Äî to love and be loved, to share experience, to respect and be respected, to work in common tasks.

üí¨ Herbert Simon

‚ù§Ô∏è‚Äçüî•Happy Valentine‚Äôs Dayüíìüíòüíùüíï

üéµ Musical Muscle Memory.

content.html:
Readwise Help for Readwise People

Readwise views are really useful but the commands to do what you want are not obvious. These two from the horse‚Äôs mouth we know as Dan Doyon.

Show me all docs that have no tags: has__not:tags

Show me all docs that have no highlights: has__not:highlights

Show me all docs that have highlights: has:highlights
content.value:

Show me all docs that have highlights: has:highlights
